alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 12:05PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of northwestern Bay, Walton, southwestern Holmes and western Washington Counties through 1245 PM EST/1145 AM CST/... At 1203 PM EST/1103 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 7 miles south of Eglin Air Force Base to near Santa Rosa Beach to 20 miles southeast of Destin to 28 miles west of Panama City Beach. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Portland, Whitehead Crossroads, Alpine Heights, Villa Tasso, Seminole Hills, Blue Mountain Beach, De Funiak Spring Airport, Seaside, Rock Hill and Holmes Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
